achievements.title: Foundational Knowledge
achievements.description: Very strong knowledge of networking fundamentals, with foundational expertise across Windows & Linux systems, cloud platforms like Azure, programming (Python, C#), and web development. This broad skillset, including configuring servers like Apache, is built on extensive training, including the CompTIA curriculum.

achievements.title: Driven by Curiosity
achievements.description: I'm constantly exploring new tools and methodologies to find smarter, more efficient ways to solve complex problems and stay ahead of the curve.
